question: What is the distribution of aircraft types used for domestic versus international flights?
query:
SELECT ac.model,
       CASE WHEN dep.iso_country = arr.iso_country THEN 'Domestic' ELSE 'International' END AS flight_type,
       COUNT(*) AS flight_count
FROM postgres_air.flight f
JOIN postgres_air.aircraft ac ON f.aircraft_code = ac.code
JOIN postgres_air.airport dep ON f.departure_airport = dep.airport_code
JOIN postgres_air.airport arr ON f.arrival_airport = arr.airport_code
GROUP BY ac.model, flight_type
ORDER BY ac.model, flight_type;
